author: lordofdragonss
title: I love his mask
review:
Realy nice small Bionicle set.
This was my first Bionicle set, (I wanted Nokama instead T^T)

Pros:
Small
Nice elements
-Staff
-Mask(The best from all turaga)
-heads for foots

Cons:
None

I give this set a equal five!

author: turdles_on_my_waffles
title: Worst LEGO Bionicle set ever
review:
This was one of my first Bionicle sets and its HORRIBLE! Its as small as my finger and can hardly move! 

pros:

  • none!

cons:

  • tiny
  • hardly movable
  • weapon is bigger then the whole set
  • worst pieces
  • EVERYTHING ELSE!

 Overall this is one of the worst LEGO sets.
